dcterms:creator: K. Loparo
dcterms:description: The CWRU bearing vibration dataset is utilized to assess the efficiency of the suggested DSAGCN method, which includes vibration data obtained using an accelerometer under four different operating conditions caused by load changes ranging from 0 to 3 hp. This dataset considers four different bearing health modes: Normal, Inner Race fault (IRF), Outer Race Fault (ORF), and Roller Fault (RF), with three different severity faults for each mode.
dcterms:title: CWRU Bearing Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Lessmeier
J. K. Kimotho
D. Zimmer
W. Sextro
dcterms:description: The Paderborn bearing dataset includes vibration data collected from a modular test rig under various working conditions, including different rotational speeds and loads. It considers three different bearing health conditions: Normal, Inner Race Fault (IRF), and Outer Race Fault (ORF), with data collected using an accelerometer.
dcterms:title: Paderborn Bearing Dataset
